message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $140. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit steep for me. Would you consider $110?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth a lot to me. How about we meet in the middle at $125?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we split the difference again and settle on $117?
You drive a hard bargain, Bob!  I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I can't go any lower than $120.  This is my final offer.
